content:
Hello.
Did rust enable DWARF5 by default recently?
hm, there was an LLVM upgrade about a month ago, I suppose that might have done it
(but I'm not sure if it's enabled by default)

Comment from 17 days ago:

I used readelf --debug-dump=info rustc | grep -A 2 'Compilation Unit @' on bootstrap rustc and it seems to me that we already use DWARF version 4.
Oh wait, bootstrap rustc, that might be an older one.
I think LLVM still defaults to DWARF4, and rustc only sets it when the target spec says so -- which is currently only used to dial back to 2 on some platforms
Clang 14 just changed to default DWARF5 though
